name: Avatar’s Duty
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust Wyn → remove Avatar’s Duty from the game.
Place each [[cosmic entity ]]card from your removed-from-game area into your discard pile. This card gains surge.

name: Cubisk Core
text: [star] Cubisk Core gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for each [[cosmic entity]] in the removed- from-game area. (Ser Reddwyn’s nemesis minion.) [star] Boost: This card gains [boost] for each [[cosmic entity]] in the removed-from-game area. “I am here to destroy the dream and wake you from your slumber...”

name: Babylon Event
text: “That spell... Did I hear it incorrectly, or was that the beginning of an elder pantheon breach?” -Jericho Drumm Permanent. Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is at least 10 threat here, each player takes damage equal to half their printed hit points.

name: Advance the Ritual
text: When Revealed: Choose: Either place 4 threat on Babylon Event, or deal yourself 2 encounter cards. [star] Boost: Choose: Either place 2 threat on Babylon Event, or this card gains [boost][boost]. “Regrets are for the dream. You are awake now. Open your eyes.” -Cubisk Core

name: Finale
text: When Revealed: Each character you control takes 2 damage. For each character defeated this way, place 2 threat on Babylon Event. [star] Boost: Choose: Either place 3 threat on Babylon Event, or this card gains [boost][boost][boost]. “Regrets are for the dream. You are awake now. Open your eyes.” -Cubisk Core
